entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
